childish gambino: tires screech outside. dude 2 stands up. theres a small crash outside  yelling  voice: freeze  gunshots  the boy and dude 2 look at each other  dude 1 kicks open the door. he starts firing. dude 2 falls. a mist of red puff spurts from his chest. hes screaming  the boy walks out of the closet in the bathroom of the mansion hes alone he walks around and realizes the place isnt trashed just dirty he goes out back. vanessa is sitting at the edge of  the pool  the boy hey  vanessa hey  they sit in silence for a while. its awkward  the boy what is this  when he says that fam and marcus walk out of the house and joke and shit. they dont look at him the boy is used to this he realizes vanessa is holding his hand the boy you dont like me  vanessa i do though  the boy lets not do this now  vanessa yeah  someone puts on thinkin bout you. the boy laughs. naomi walks out and sits next to him on the otherside. she holds his hand  naomi things will be fine  the boy nothing real is ever fine  naomi smiles  naomi i know  steve fam marcus sasha and everyone else come over and stand around the boy. the sunset is making it all golden. the lights in the house are already on. by this time sierra leone is playing the boy gets it roscoes wetsuit the boys chest erupts as bullets hit him. he feels nothing. vanessa and naomi let him fall into the pool. he feels water fill him. there is no wave of euphoria. he just floats there. himself
